      • call

        private void call(Player player)
        Makes a player call the bet that is on the table, i.e. put ih the chips needed to join the game.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is calling the bet or calling the raise.

      • raise

        private void raise(Player player)
        Makes a player raise, i.e. put in even more chips than is necessary to join the game.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is making the raise.

      • goAllIn

        private void goAllIn(Player player)
        Makes a player go all in.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player who is going all in.

      • setHand

        public void setHand(Player player)
        Method that computes the rank of each possible combination of the five cards on the table plus the two cards a player has. The highest of those ranks is saved in the attribute 'rank' in the hand those two cards belong to.
        Parameters:
        player - - a player in the game.

      • determineWinner

        public int[] determineWinner()
        Determines which player who has the best hand.
        Returns:
        The ID(s) of a player/players with the best hand.
